translation: The Blessed Lord said, "From whence has this perilous strait come upon you, this dejection which is unworthy of you, disgraceful, and which will close the gates of heaven upon you, O Arjuna?"
commentary: 2.2 Where whence? Twa upon thee? Kashmala dejection? This is this? Odd in perilous strait? present comes? anaryanjushtam unworthy (unaryanlike)? Unheavenly heavenexcluding? Disgraceful disgraceful? Arjuna O Arjuna.No commentary.
